pullrequest.title: Added wait to CIface when publishing

content.raw:
Yes, I want to make sure that the first message can be delivered. I'm not sure what you mean by "not sure if that value is flexible enough". The timeout is flexible enough for the command line tool. Is there something different here?

Adding a new function parameter seems like we would be promoting this hack to affect the public facing API. When the `WaitForSubscribers` is implemented then the downstream user can call `WaitForSubscribers`, if needed, and we can remove this sleep. The Publish API will remain unchanged.
